npc_output: Hi, I'm feeling hopeful today, want to talk about crafting?
Excited to see you, I was just thinking about cooking something new
Anxious about finding a new herb for my potions, have you seen any?
Happy to see you, I was just thinking about designing a new outfit
Ugh, angry about the rain, want to hear a song to cheer me up?
Neutral as always, but I could use some company, want to talk about cooking?
Happy to see you, I was thinking about pouring some drinks for the festival
